name: ΕΝΩΣΗ ΘΕΣΜΙΚΩΝ ΕΠΕΝΔΥΤΩΝ - HELLENIC FUND AND ASSET MANAGEMENT ASSOCIATION
goal: We are a private law company, the trade association representing Mutual Fund Management Companies, Asset Management firms, REICs, Portfolio Investment Companies, and other AIFMs. Our purpose is to promote the industry of collective investment schemes and professional asset management.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: CAPITAL MARKETS UNION, UCITS v, MIFID II, PRIPS, CMD V, EMIR, AIFMD, PEPP, SRD II, AML, EUVECA-EUSEF, BENCHMARKS, SECURITISATION, IFRS 9, FTT, BEPS, CCTB & CCCTB.
